#include <cstdio>
#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int main(int argc, char const *argv[])
{
	int t,n,k;
	float x,y;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--){
		scanf("%d%d%f%f",&n,&k,&x,&y);
		//cout<<n*720/(x+y)<<"\n";
		float numer = (n-k)*(1-y);
		float denom = n-(k*x+(n-k)*y);
		//cout<<(.4f)numer/denom<<"\n";
		printf("%.4f\n",numer/denom);
	}
	return 0;
}
